## Tutorial


::: {.cell hash='network_gnar_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_039e04b6ce774d3d46d77deee2e24937'}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](network_gnar_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='network_gnar_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_ef8c6031cda0564e0d01e5539d266c1f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
# make_graph(~1-2-3-1, 1-4-5) # make igraph
# fiveVTS
five_gnar <- GNARfit(vts = fiveVTS, net = fiveNet, alphaOrder = 2)
# alphaOrder gives time lag
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='network_gnar_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_047ce709b18c153c3a932d3c28266f98'}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(fiveVTS[,1], ylab = "Node A time series")
lines(fitted(five_gnar)[,1], col = 2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](network_gnar_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


The residuals are examined as follows



::: {.cell hash='network_gnar_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_d484d61aa011a7e03b95abd8e94c9992'}

```{.r .cell-code}
layout(matrix(c(1,2), 2, 1))
par(mar = c(4.1, 4.1, 1, 2.1), cex.axis = 0.9)
plot(ts(residuals(five_gnar)[,1]), ylab = "model residuals")
hist(residuals(five_gnar)[,1], main = "", xlab = "model residuals")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](network_gnar_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



Show that GNAR does not have a problem with missing data,


::: {.cell hash='network_gnar_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_2491d4099eb084cc7ece5773cbbfa440'}

```{.r .cell-code}
fiveVTS0 <- fiveVTS

fiveVTS0[50:150, 3] <- NA
nafit <- GNARfit(vts = fiveVTS0, net = fiveNet, alphaOrder = 2, betaOrder = c(1, 1))
layout(matrix(c(1, 2), 2, 1))
par(mar = c(4.1, 4.1, 0.75, 2.1), cex.axis = 0.75)
plot(ts(fitted(nafit)[, 3]), ylab = "Node C fitted values")
par(mar = c(4.1, 4.1, 0.75, 2.1), cex.axis = 0.75)
plot(ts(fitted(nafit)[, 4]), ylab = "Node D fitted values")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](network_gnar_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
